lines.text: ...Huh. This guy’s got a statue of another wizard in his lair?
Yeah, I’m no fan of the creepy statue.
I can’t shake the feelin' it’s important to this case, though…
...Well, I don’t see anything interesting about it now.
A looming statue of a wizard. Kinda givin’ me the heebie-jeebies…
So now we know this guy’s a Stop Wizard, who ended up on the wrong end of his own <c=#0000FF>Flesh to Stone</c> spell.
Not a fun way to go.
Saves us the trouble of lockin' him up, at least.
Man, have a little empathy! How would you feel if you got turned to stone?
Because… I wouldn’t. I’d be a statue.
Feh. Just ‘cause he’s a wizard, you don’t care what happened to him?
I think he deserves what happened to him, because it could only have happened to him if he tried to turn someone else to stone, and failed.
It’s, what do you call it… karma.
Sheesh. Remind me not to invite you to any funerals, Leo.
Alas, poor Stop Wizard. You were taken from us too soon (for us to interrogate you!)
